result.title: A small script that sends you an email with your updated Codeforces rating
result.content:
Hello, everyone!

I'm a hobbyist Python programmer and I've developed a handy Python script that sends an email to the user whenever his CodeForces rating is updated. Just run the script once a contest is finished and you'll receive an email as soon as the rating is changed. You can download it from here â€” codeforces-rating-alert. Please comment if any change is necessary.
